contentHtml: #141. What's the output? const person = { name: 'Lydia Hallie', hobbies: ['coding'], }; function addHobby(hobby, hobbies = person.hobbies) { hobbies.push(hobby); return hobbies; } addHobby('running', []); addHobby('dancing'); addHobby('baking', person.hobbies); console.log(person.hobbies); javascript A: ["coding"] B: ["coding", "dancing"] C: ["coding", "dancing", "baking"] D: ["codi
